titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3389) to reauthorize the National Sea Grant College Program Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-514, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

In lieu of the amendments recommended by the Committee on Resources and the Committee on Science now printed in the bill, it shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 173.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 446.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/18/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 3389 (National Sea Grant College Program reauthorization).
